dmca.title: [ABUSE] Regarding illegal hosting of Lineage 2 server files
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: The Planet Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Friday, February 18, 2005 2:28 PM
Cc: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] Regarding illegal hosting of Lineage 2 server files

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1




Your email is being sent to our copyright-related legal counsel at the
address copyright@theplanet.com for consideration.

- --
Thanks,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/aup/


This is a forwarded message
From: NCsoft IP Rights <iprights@ncsoft.com>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>
Date: Friday, February 18, 2005, 10:58:22 AM
Subject: [ABUSE] Regarding illegal hosting of Lineage 2 server files

===8<==============Original message text===============
Good morning,



Please review the attached PDF regarding possible copyright infringement
on your network, including the illegal modification and distribution of
files from the online game, Lineage 2. Your prompt attention to this
matter is certainly appreciated.



Please let me know if there are any questions or concerns - thank you.



William Leverett

NC Interactive, Inc.

Austin, Texas

iprights@ncsoft.com






===8<===========End of original message text===========
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.2.5 (MingW32)

iD8DBQFCFk/PvK/XpJs6oyURAk8tAKCr6f79wIkyZhTQ+DG8/kQVqG3efQCfdF50
xSJTMlwhEVS1K3Ov4zin34k=
=vQZ1
-----END PGP SIGNATURE-----
